title: "Pleo Selects Lucinity to Provide Trusted AI-powered AML Software as it Continues to Scale"
excerpt: "Pleo, the Danish $4.7B FinTech used by 20,000 companies across Europe, has selected Lucinity as its central hub for Financial Crime Prevention after a rigorous selection process. Founded in 2015, Pleo offers smart spending solutions for forward-thinking companies through a streamlined approach to expense management."
